title: Ambassador of Japan calls on IT Minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 16 (APP):Federal Minister for IT Syed Amin Ul Haque on Thursday said Ministry of Information Technology and Telecom had the potential to provide every possible facility to Japanese companies.
In a call on meeting with Ambassador of Japan to Pakistan Mitsuhiro WADA here on Thursday, he said Pakistan had great potential in the field of Information Technology (IT), adding, Japan could benefit from Pakistani IT experts.
During the meeting, the two sides agreed to enhance cooperation in the field of information technology between the two countries.
Ambassador of Japan said Pakistani youth were able and talented and Pakistanâ€™s IT experts could be beneficial for Japan.
He also appreciated the steps of Ministry of IT and Telecom for fulfilling Digital Pakistan vision.  Secretary IT, Dr. Sohail Rajput and senior officers of Ministry were also present in the meeting.
